attributes.action: outdoor sports/ gyms to stay open & for essential mental and health well being
attributes.additional_details: Todays society is suffering people are going to be confined and under pressure to abide by Rules, but a 6 mile walk socially distanced Golf, a game of tennis, bowls or even socially distanced gym activity can help people’s state of mind & a lot of people need this & it again is essential for people to exercise both mind and body
attributes.background: If we are to mentally survive Covid we need to be allowed to exercise and outdoor games such as golf, tennis, bowls and indoor gym classes or machine usage helps people a lot, we need the government to allow it

rejection.details:
Under the local tier restrictions implemented on 2 December, outdoor organised sport can continue and gyms can remain open, with some restrictions on contact activity and indoor exercise classes in areas in the highest risk tier (tier 3). 

See: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know
